Description: Ostracon, large section of the upper-body of a red-brown pottery ribbed jar, the fabric is partially grey in section, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and very faint traces traces of a red-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394290) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394290)
